title: How to Send Investigation Request via email?
body:
Follow these steps on how  to send Investigation Requests using Email on Demand:
Open Patient Record
Click Clinical Tab 
Click the Letter Writer icon


Fill in all required fields then click Save

On the letter writer, Click on Letter then Select Investigations
Select the template you want to use.

Data of the recent Investigation Request created will populate on the letter template selected.
Click File then Select Save and change the status from Draft to Final
For additional steps in sending Requests to patients or contacts using email on demand, please see this article. How to Send an Email to Contacts or Patient.
